title: When you start dancing, and your enemy laner joins in.

replies.body: then u burst him
BM

Ill be honest i dont really know what bm means...
is it
Bitch move?
Bad manners?
Big Mace?
bad manners

In Medical terminology, it's a Bowel Movement. Which is oddly appropriate for all the Bitch Move-ing Bad Mannered Bastard Motherfuckers in this game.

Ultimately, the tone of the abbreviation ends up almost more important than the actual meaning.

http://media1.giphy.com/media/EAOTD2L0qyvhm/giphy.gif http://www.scuffletown.org/wp-content/uploads/2008/04/dance3.gif https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/d9/25/5d/d9255db9bb3a09b60db6a01057783442.jpg

Anyone know what anime that first gif is from?

> [{quoted}](name=SpecterVonBaren,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ej6Ar1z2,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-05-03T09:43:01.630+0000)
>
> Anyone know what anime that first gif is from?

Through the power of google, it seems to be associated with a particular media franchise/toy line called Jewelpet.

That particular scene in the first gif is taken from one among the franchise's many anime titles called "Jewelpet Sunshine".
You are a gentleman and a scholar.

Bot Lane.
Let them dance!
Then you nuke his sorry face because LOL!

I still think one of my favorite games was back when i was like in the mid teens (maybe level 13 or 14?) Anyway, I was playing Sion mid versus Akaki. Ends up being an extremely chill game with the two of us dancing and not last-hitting anything. Anyway, we were just there talking and having a merry old time, talking and having fun. Their Jungle fiddlesticks was being a jerk and ganking occasionally, to which they both swarmed me, but i always got a double, even if they got me. Their Akali was chill about it, though, and we joked about it a bit. 
It was one of my favorite games. just chilling with your laner and goofing off all game long is a good way to let off steam

then you gank him
:^)
blitz hook into alistar headbutt.
